list.title: Cluster#eval
list.description: A self-contained cluster created by the {@link ClusterManager}. Each one has a {@link Child} that contains an instance of the bot and its {@link Client}. When its child process/worker exits for any reason, the cluster will spawn a new one to replace it as necessary.

list.title: Cluster#kill
list.description: A self-contained cluster created by the {@link ClusterManager}. Each one has a {@link Child} that contains an instance of the bot and its {@link Client}. When its child process/worker exits for any reason, the cluster will spawn a new one to replace it as necessary.

list.title: Cluster#triggerMaintenance
list.description: A self-contained cluster created by the {@link ClusterManager}. Each one has a {@link Child} that contains an instance of the bot and its {@link Client}. When its child process/worker exits for any reason, the cluster will spawn a new one to replace it as necessary.

list.title: error
list.description: Emitted when the client encounters an error.

list.title: death
list.description: Emitted upon the cluster's child process/worker exiting.

list.title: error
list.description: Emitted upon the cluster's child process/worker error.

list.title: spawn
list.description: Emitted upon the creation of the cluster's child process/worker.

list.title: message
list.description: Emitted upon receiving a message from the parent process/worker.

list.title: message
list.description: Emitted upon receiving a message from the child process/worker.
